fullText: This biographical musical about Donna Summer is a blast of fresh air on Broadway, with powerhouse vocals and disco beats that will have you dancing in your seat.
dtliExcerpt: This biographical musical about Donna Summer is a blast of fresh air on Broadway, with powerhouse vocals and disco beats that will have you dancing in your seat.
bwwExcerpt: "Summer," which opened Monday, is borderline incoherent. It turns a complex woman's life into a hagiography, a slide show of events - Boston childhood, stint in Europe, fame, motherhood, illness - minus context or emotion.
showScoreExcerpt: This biographical musical about Donna Summer is a blast of fresh air on Broadway, with powerhouse vocals and disco beats that will have you dancing in your seat.
